title: How to Hold a Drumstick Traditional

steps.title: Hold a drumstick
steps.content: Hold a drumstick in your right hand like you would match grip. Your thumb on the left side and your other fingers wrapped around the stick.

steps.title: Open your left hand, palm up.
steps.content: Open your left hand, palm up. Put the back end of the stick between your middle and ring fingers.

steps.title: Slide the stick into the "L" shape that is made between your thumb and pointer finger.
steps.content: Slide the stick into the "L" shape that is made between your thumb and pointer finger.

steps.title: Close your hand, not very tightly.
steps.content: Close your hand, not very tightly. Put your middle finger about 1/3 of the way down the stick, and your pointer about a centimeter and a half behind it. Your ring and pinky fingers should be underneath the stick, with your pinky under your ring finger.
